thread.title: Video of Mom Trying to Use the Bathroom Without Her Toddler
thread.title_full: Video of Mom Trying to Use the Bathroom Without Her Toddler | POPSUGAR Moms

author: Lauren Levy
title: Video of Mom Trying to Use the Bathroom Without Her Toddler
text:
Once you have a baby, good luck getting time to do anything alone . For some moms, that means having greasy hair because you can't leave your baby alone for a shower or pooping with your little one watching because they don't understand boundaries or personal space.
When this mom made it into the bathroom — alone — she thought she finally had a golden moment to pee in peace, but she caught what happened next on video. In the hysterical clip , the mom is heard asking her daughter to close the door, then expertly counts down to five, knowing that her toddler is pretty much obligated to barge in as she struggles with the concept of what her mom is doing.
Prepare for a good laugh and a nod of understanding toward this incredibly patient mama and her adorable toddler!
